summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the Orcish set
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1311.photobucket.com/albums/s677/Cabal_Amidianborn/logonewgreen_zps7837025d.jpg[/IMG]
[center][color=green][size=5][b]Hi-Res texture replacer for orcish set[/b][/size][/color]


[b][size=4]aMidianBorn Retexture Pack >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]Book of Silence[/url] <<<[/size][/b][/center]


[size=3][b][color=purple]Distribution permission[/color][/b]:This file is a Nexus-exclusive release, please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere. I will not give, nor want to give, permission for any kind of reupload.
[/size]

[right][url=http://www.facebook.com/cabal.amidianborn][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w448/CaBaL120/facebookbutton.png[/IMG][/url][/right] 

[size=3]  °°° HD texture replacer for the Orcish set

°°° Same resolution as the official high-res DLC textures

°°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.

°°° This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions (for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.

°°° INSTALLATION: Drop the \"textures\" folder inside your Data folder, or just use the mod manager.

°°° A brighter version is also now availble in the Files tab

The Videowall:
A particular thanks to Brodual for the interest during the texture creation process, and for uploading the video with the mod release itself. Another huge THANKS to all the video makers for their kind words and the extremely helpful work.
Do not forget to LIKE & SUBSCRIBE what you appreciate.
[center][youtube]jenKxzSeXls[/youtube][/center]

[center][youtube]aq0zlT1Mzmk[/youtube] [youtube]G_MCc7u1IAw[/youtube]  [youtube]xT95fPdyp6A[/youtube] [youtube]anlXBM8441w[/youtube] [youtube]O5vN-maSXRs[/youtube][/center]
